content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to hug a tree on #{selected_days} starting from today until #{auto_destruct} between #{time_range}.
To prove my commitment, I will send a photo each day of myself hugging a tree on the days Iâ€™ve committed.
This is my promise to myself â€” to reconnect with nature, slow down, and feel the living world around me. ðŸŒ³ðŸ¤—

basicQuest.title: Hug a Tree
basicQuest.description: Sometimes, you just need to hold something older, stronger, and more grounded than yourself. Hugging a tree is a reminder that you're part of something bigger, rooted, and alive.
